Class SubnetPlace

java.lang.Object
  org.rakiura.draw.AbstractFigure
      org.rakiura.draw.figure.AttributeFigure
          org.rakiura.draw.figure.EllipseFigure
              org.rakiura.cpn.gui.SubnetPlace
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, org.rakiura.draw.Figure, org.rakiura.draw.FigureChangeListener, org.rakiura.draw.ParentFigure
public class SubnetPlace
extends org.rakiura.draw.figure.EllipseFigure
implements org.rakiura.draw.FigureChangeListener

This is a fake Place to shadow a real place in a parent net.

Since:
3.0
Version:
4.1.0 $Revision: 1.12 $
Author:

Constructor Detail

SubnetPlace

public SubnetPlace()
constructor for loadLayout & stuff

SubnetPlace

public SubnetPlace(java.lang.String aPlaceFigureID)
A Place that shadows a real place figure outside a subnet.

Parameters:
aPlaceFigureID - the id of the place to shadow. Could be used to prevent creation of multiple SubnetPlaces that refer to the same real place. And it is used for the toString method.

public void figureChanged(org.rakiura.draw.FigureChangeEvent e)

public void release()
Releases the figures resources. This method is usually called after it has permanently been removed from a drawing. It stops listening to its connectionfigures.
